nodes.bodyText: This component have several buttons that throws an error in the console and cannot be easily disabled, outside of copy pasting the code. Should I do that instead?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -349,12 +349,92 @@

Managing Session Responses

5 different views are available, each denoting the order in which responses are grouped. Additionally, you can group the results by team, show or hide statistics, view missing responses and filter responses from a particular section.

-

EXAMPLE BOX

+

+ +
+
+
+ +
+ +
+
+
+
+ +
+ Group by Teams +
+
+ Show Statistics +
+
+ Indicate Missing Responses +
+
+
+

In the example below, results are sorted by Giver > Recipient > Question. Additionally, missing responses have been recorded.

-

EXAMPLE BOX

Basically there's 2 buttons Remind All and Submit response.
Clicking on remind all does nothing and throws the following error to the console

Clicking on Submit response will redirect them away to a non-working Submit feedback page and print an error on the console.

nodes.bodyText:

Similar implementation can be found in question-edit-form.component.
